taskbody.prereq: Ensure that you have selected the required cartridges in the project properties.

step.cmd: In the Project Explorer view pane, right-click on the project, package, or model for which you want to generate documentation, and select Generate Documentation .
To view the generated Excel files related to Domain and translations, open the Documentation folder of the project in the Project Explorer view pane.

choices.choice:
To view Domain Designer documentation files, open the domain folder, and find in The file _data_model_entities.xls summary of all generated applications and Domain_
DomainName
.xls corresponding to generated domain model. .
To view translation documentation files, open the Doc folder. The file Translation.xls contains all generated translations .

step.cmd:
Right-click on the Excel file you want to open and select
Open With System Editor
step.stepresult: This opens the file in Excel.
